reviewTitle: A great and funny Day with Tasos !!
review_details:
Tasos is a very friendly, hospitable and courteous person.
In my opinion one of the best excursions in the area of Galatas / Poros.
Thanks Taso for the great time.
See you in the Summer:)

Best cafe and breakfast in Galatas. We visit this locally every day and the staff was always very friendly.
Ευχαριστούμε πολύ για όλα
See you next year
